content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in vilnius city district court the case involved the division of matrimonial property and the dissolution of a marriage the defendant was responsible for paying a stamp duty and court fees the court attempted to locate the defendant but was unsuccessful the court received replies from various parties involved in the case including the state tax inspectorate and the panevėžys territorial patient fund the evidence showed that the parties had a prenuptial agreement the court granted the applicants application in full and ordered the defendant to pay the applicants costs the court also ordered the defendant to pay a sum to the state budget

metadata.cost: 105.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 19.92 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
